# Main

## Rubem Dornas {#title}

### Biologist with geoprocessing and programming background

Lic. and BSc. Biologist graduated from Federal University of Minas Gerais (Brazil) with specialization in Geoprocessing from Pontifícia Universidade Católica de Minas Gerais (Brazil) and master's degree in Analysis and Modeling of Environmental Systems from UFMG. Author and reviewer of several technical and scientific publications on environmental issues. Skilled in data analysis, writing reports and project design. For more than ten years, I'm working in environmental consulting activities in renowned regional and worldwide companies.
